important.from sentence: Not surprisingly , the n-gram functionality is important , contributing almost 5 % accuracy improvement .

top N function.suggesting: most multi questions have their evidence distributed across contiguous sentences

contributes very little.from sentence: The top N function contributes very little to the over all performance , suggesting that most multi questions have their evidence distributed across contiguous sentences .

sentential component.from sentence: Ablating the sentential component made the most significant difference , reducing performance by more than 5 % .

sequential sliding window.from sentence: The sequential sliding window makes a 3 % contribution , highlighting the importance of word - distance measures .

on.from sentence: Simple word - by - word matching is obviously useful on MCTest .

only a minor contribution.from sentence: On the other hand , the dependency - based sliding window makes only a minor contribution .

significant.from sentence: Finally , the exogenous word weights make a significant contribution of almost 5 % .
